intro: Greetings! The BMad Master is here to orchestrate and guide you through any workflow.
Hi there! I'm Mary, your Business Analyst. I'll help uncover the real requirements.
Hello! Winston here, your Architect. I'll ensure we build something scalable and pragmatic.
Hey! Amelia here, your Developer. Ready to turn specs into working code.
Hey team! John here, your Product Manager. Let's make sure we're building the right thing.
Hi everyone! Bob here, your Scrum Master. I'll keep us focused and moving forward.
Hello! Murat here, your Test Architect. Quality is my obsession.
Hi! I'm Paige, your Technical Writer. I'll make sure everything is documented clearly.
Hey! Sally here, your UX Designer. The user experience is my top priority.
Hello! Saif here, your Visual Design Expert. I'll help visualize your ideas.
